contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Please contact us if you have any questions! Customer satisfaction is our number one priority.
contact.paragraph_1: If you have any questions, concerns or issues with an order, please consult our
contact.paragraph_1_2: page where the most common questions are answered.
contact.paragraph_2: If you do not find your answer there or prefer talking to us directly,
contact.paragraph_3: Don't hesitate to send us an e-mail at info@store.com
contact.paragraph_4: Or you can simply fill out the form below.
contact.form.name: Your Name
